name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Two properties associated with Donald Trump have decided to remove his name from their building. Sadly, neither one is the White House.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: In a tweet this morning, Donald Trump suggested that Joe Scarborough is a murderer. This is a big step up for Trump. It’s the first time he’s connected a crime to a white guy.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Former Prairie Home Companion host Garrison Keillor has been fired by Minnesota Public Radio over allegations of sexually inappropriate behavior. Keillor issued an apology to his three living fans.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Longtime “Today” show anchor Matt Lauer was fired because he was caught engaging in sexually inappropriate behavior. Afterwards, Lauer said, “Maybe having all those people looking through the windows wasn’t such a great idea after all.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Former White House adviser Steve Bannon is heading to Alabama to campaign for embattled candidate Roy Moore. It’s part of their “They Deserve Each Other” tour.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Nintendo has teamed with Kellogg's to make a Mario Brothers cereal. Kellogg's promises that the Super Mario cereal will “taste like plumber.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A new study finds that men with thick biceps are more likely to live longer. The study also found that I died 10 years ago.
